shortDescription: The Form Maker by 10Web WordPress plugin before 1.15.20 does not validate signatures when creating them on the server from user input, allowing unauthenticated users to create arbitrary files and lead to RCE
vulnerabilityName: Form Maker by 10Web WordPress plugin Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
